title: ardeverb
author: ardeverb
content: I currently have one Bitmain X5 but the machine is crippled to monero only. Are there currently some development for an alternative firmware for it. Any info or teams working on it. Every info is welcome.Â Best regardsArthur

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Bitmain X5 is already being discussedhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465216.0This ASIC is made on risc-v processors and therefore it can work on many algorithms. If you are asking whether there will be a new firmware after the Monero fork, then most likely yes. If possible, the best way to mine other coins is to watch official channels. I think that this was not a large batch of ASICs for third-party developers to be interested in it.
